titles: Truth and innocency defended against calumny and defamation in a late report spread abroad concerning the revolution of humane souls : with a futher clearing of the truth by a plain explication of my sence, &c. / by George Keith.
author: Keith, George, 1639?-1716.
notes: Occasioned by Keith's denial of his authorship of Two hundred queries moderately propounded concerning the doctrine of the revolution of humane souls, by Franciscus Mercurius van Helmont.
Reproduction of original in Library of Congress.
keywords: Helmont, Franciscus Mercurius van, 1614-1699. --  Two hundred queries moderately propounded concerning ... humane souls.
